subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer beat Juan Martín del Potro to advance and Andy Murray beat Novak Djokovic; Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova will play in the women’s final.
snippet: Roger Federer beat Juan Martín del Potro to advance and Andy Murray beat Novak Djokovic; Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova will play in the women’s final.
